docs.snippet: The streaming music service is adding options to remain competitive with Apple and YouTube....
docs.lead_paragraph: The streaming music service is adding options to remain competitive with Apple and YouTube.
docs.abstract: Spotify is expanding its streaming music services to include podcasts and short video clips, as well as predictive playlists for users based on time of day; features are attempting to stay competitive with Apple and YouTube.

headline.main: Spotify Is Expanding to Include Video and Predictive Playlists
headline.print_headline: Spotify Is Expanding to Include Video and Predictive Playlists
